name: Burrito-Style Hot Dog Roll-Ups
author: Mackenzie Schieck
summary: These hot dogs wrapped in tortillas are a fun twist on the usual dog, and great for a grab-and-go meal. Try different flavored tortillas for other delicious twists!
directions: Place hot dogs in a medium frying pan over medium heat
Cook, turning occasionally, until cooked on all sides, about 5 minutes
Place 1 slice of American cheese in the middle of each tortilla
Place cooked hot dogs over the cheese slices
Roll up tortillas around the filling
Place all 4 roll-ups on a microwave-safe plate
Cook in the microwave for 10 to 12 seconds to fully melt the cheese and warm the tortillas
Drizzle ketchup and mustard over the roll-ups
